Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Pulaski

Headline: #15 Jeffrey Local Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park/Drexel
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffrey Local buses are rerouted in both directions via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 47th, Drexel & Hyde Park, due to fire department activity near Hyde Park/Drexel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
